price: Ariko rero abantu ni bo bahavuye bicamwo imigwi ha gukurikira idini rimwe, gutyo basenga ibigirwamana batwawe n’ivyipfuzo vyabo. Iyo migwi yose rero, impera n’imperuka izogaruka iwacu Twebwe Allah, kugira iharurirwe iheze ihemberwe ivyo yakoze.
arabic: وَتَقَطَّعُوٓاْ أَمۡرَهُم بَيۡنَهُمۡۖ كُلٌّ إِلَيۡنَا رَٰجِعُونَ

meta.transliteration: wataqaṭṭaʿū amrahum baynahum kullun ilaynā rājiʿūna
